entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-02-13
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Which commit corresponds to 4.4.0 (latest) on nuget? #66848
  • Stack overflow due to struct layout cycle #66844
  • `T` in pattern `obj is not T` or `obj is ... or T` relates to containing type's property `T` instead of type name `T` if `T` is declared as both a property and a type #66841
  • IncrementalValuesProvider returns wrong cached objects #66840

Closed

  • StackOverflowException in Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.VisualBasic.Workspaces.dll #5529
    Backlog
  • Incorrect NRT tooltip when doing null check #66854
  • EditorBrowsable is not working on Visual Studio 2022 #66843
  • OpenProjectAsync throws exception when opening a project. CSharpCompilerInputs returns duplicate argument (/ruleset) after compilation. #8408
    Backlog
  • Completion should not be displayed after switch expression #37315
    Backlog
  • Introduce using statement should offer a using declaration in C# 8.0 projects #33699
    Backlog
  • Document's SemanticModel.GetSymbolInfo always returns a null symbol #23913
    Compiler.Next
  • Feature request: null coalescing code fix for wider scenarios #28180
    Backlog
  • VS Visual Basic offers invalid simplification inside "nameof" expression for Keywords #34494
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Address PROTOTYPE comments for "Primary Constructors" #66865
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Primary Constructors
  • Push on Restore bug #66864
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Move the 'make method async' fixer down to shared layer #66863
    Area-IDE
  • Move the 'make method synchronous' fixer down to shared layer #66862
    Area-IDE
  • Hook up DidChangeConfiguration from client #66861
    Area-IDE
  • Move 'doc comment' related code fixers down to shared layer #66860
    Area-IDE
  • Move 'convert to record' fixer down to shared layer #66859
    Area-IDE
  • Don't include star when committing promoted item #66858
    Area-IDE
  • Move the 'remove new modifier' fixer down to shared layer #66857
    Area-IDE
  • Move the 'remove in keyword' fixer down to shared layer #66856
    Area-IDE
  • Move 'conflict resolution' fixer down to shared layer #66855
    Area-IDE
  • move the 'make struct a ref struct' fixer down to shared layer #66853
    Area-IDE
  • move the 'remove async modifier' fixer down to shared layer #66852
    Area-IDE
  • move 'remove unused local function' down to shared layer #66851
    Area-IDE
  • Move the 'replace default literal' fixer down to shared layer #66850
    Area-IDE
  • Move the 'upgrade project' fixer down to the shared layer #66849
    Area-IDE
  • Move 'use explicit type for constants' down to anlayzer layer #66847
    Area-IDE
  • Remove expensive call to ApplyPolicy #66845
    Area-Compilers, 17.6
  • Remove unnecessary null suppressions in calls to `RuntimeHelpers.GetHashCode` #66842
    Area-Compilers

Merged

  • Move 'convert to async function' down to CodeStyle layer #66839
    Area-IDE, Next
  • 🔨 Enable MSBuild COMM log in bootstrap #66832
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Dev/toddgrun/request concurrency #66767
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Fix crash in FAR helpers when only part of a linked-document set has been updated #66805
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Move the 'add parens in conditional' fixer down to the CodeStyle layer #66838
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Add net6.0 TFM to ExternalAccess.Razor #66846
    Area-IDE, Next
  • EA extensibility point for F# to implement TaskList service ( TODO comments support) #66695
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Move the 'assign out parameter' fixer down to the CodeStyle layer #66837
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Add tests for some "Primary Constructors" IDE scenarios. #66774
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Primary Constructors
  • Parsing for role and extension type declarations #66728
    Area-Compilers
  • Update 'introducing using' to support using-declaration-statements as well as using-statements #66808
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Move 'add anonymous type member' down to CodeStyle layer #66835
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Fix dot completion in cases where dots are parsed as a range operator #66822
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Move 'Add Parameter' fixer down to CodeStyle layer. #66836
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Fix crash in VB type name simplification #66813
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Move 'Use local function' down to CodeStyle layer. #66825
    Area-IDE, Next

Updated

  • Local state tracing instrumentation #66768
    Area-Compilers
  • Provide unique suggestions when generating member names #66824
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Introduce Parameter - Fix crash #66402
    Area-IDE
  • Fix parsing of 'file[]' and 'required[]' in old language versions #66769
    Area-Compilers
  • Annotate MS.CA and MS.CA.C# for trimming #66519
    Area-Compilers
  • Parse pointer to arrays #65432
    Area-Compilers, Community, 17.5
  • Update Logging Methods #66826
    Area-IDE
